name: UpdateScorecardOutcomes
description:
Update multiple scorecard rule outcomes in Datadog.

Use this tool to update several scorecard rule outcomes in Datadog with a single request. Ideal for synchronizing or modifying multiple outcomes efficiently.

parameters.name: scorecard_outcomes
parameters.description: A JSON object representing a set of scorecard outcomes to be updated. Includes the type and attributes such as results with details like entity_reference, remarks, rule_id, and state.

entity_reference.description: The unique reference for an IDP entity.

remarks.description: Any remarks regarding the scorecard rule's evaluation. Supports HTML hyperlinks.

rule_id.description: The unique ID for a scorecard rule.

state.description: The state of the rule evaluation.

results.description: Set of scorecard outcomes to update asynchronously.

attributes.description: The JSON:API attributes for a batched set of scorecard outcomes.

type.description: The JSON:API type for scorecard outcomes.
